# Tulir Asokan
# Tulir Asokan
I make various things on top of [Matrix](https://matrix.org), such as the [Telegram](https://github.com/mautrix/telegram) and [WhatsApp](https://github.com/mautrix/whatsapp) bridges, the [maubot](https://github.com/maubot/maubot) bot system and my Matrix client [gomuks](https://github.com/gomuks/gomuks). I also occasionally contribute to other Matrix projects, like [element-web](https://github.com/matrix-org/matrix-react-sdk/pulls?q=is:pr+author:tulir) and [synapse](https://github.com/element-hq/synapse/pulls?q=is:pr+author:tulir). I'm currently working on [Beeper](https://www.beeper.com/) at [Automattic](https://automattic.com/) (mostly developing my mautrix bridges).
I started programming because of Minecraft and I made [quite a few Bukkit plugins](https://dl.mau.fi/plugins/) before getting bored. I've also made [a screenshot program](https://mau.photos/), [a web-based IRC client](https://github.com/tulir/mauirc), [a 2D portal-like game](https://github.com/tulir/portal2d) and other random stuff.

## Contact

-   ![](https://mau.fi/logos/email.svg) Email (not recommended): [tulir@maunium.net](mailto:tulir@maunium.net) ([PGP key](https://mau.fi/pgp))

-   ![](https://mau.fi/logos/discord.svg) Discord: @tulir
